medical_history.chief_complaint: Approximately 5 days of left-sided abdominal pain extending to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 5 days prior to admission with left-sided abdominal pain that extended to the right lower quadrant. Patient tolerated very little PO intake during this time. There were no associated symptoms of nausea or vomiting, and no fevers or chills were reported.
